00021 #ifndef CLPP_DETAIL_COMMON_CHECKER_HPP
00022 #define CLPP_DETAIL_COMMON_CHECKER_HPP
00023 
00024 #include "../types.hpp"
00025 
00028 namespace clpp {
00029 
00032 namespace detail {
00033 
00038 template
00039 <
00040     typename Parameters
00041     , typename Extractor
00042     , typename Separator
00043 >
00044 struct common_checker {
00045     common_checker( const Parameters&  _registered_parameters
00046                     , const Extractor& _extractor
00047                     , const Separator& _name_value_separator ) :
00048             registered_parameters( _registered_parameters )
00049             , extractor( _extractor )
00050             , name_value_separator( _name_value_separator ) {}
00051 public:
00052     const Parameters& registered_parameters;
00053     const Extractor&  extractor;
00054     const Separator&  name_value_separator;
00055 public:
00056     virtual void check( const str_storage& inputed_parameters ) const = 0;
00057 };
00058 
00059 } // namespace detail
00060 } // namespace clpp
00061 
00062 #endif // CLPP_DETAIL_COMMON_CHECKER_HPP
